wiki.content: Jake Shears told Q magazine that writing this song was a liberating experience. He explained; "I was in the studio here in London having a creative crisis. I wasn't just blocked; I thought it was over for us unless something drastic happened. And that song is about overcoming that moment." (Source Fire With Fire Songfacts). User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Jake Shears told Q magazine that writing this song was a liberating experience. He explained; "I was in the studio here in London having a creative crisis. I wasn't just blocked; I thought it was over for us unless something drastic happened. And that song is about overcoming that moment." (Source Fire With Fire Songfacts).

track.name: Fire With Fire
comments: I remember when this was popular in summer 2010.. good times [2]
this song really sounds like an anthem!
Amazing song... from the second best Scissters album. (Well, that's just my opinion.)
Luv this..it reminds me a bit of  the Killers  Human....
_and now we're free to be number one_
luv luv luv this (especially in cvs.. epic momento!)
I think it sounds very much like Kylie Minogue!
I remember when this was popular in summer 2010.. good times
This song plays on Belgian radio ALL. THE. FRIGGIN'. TIME. Not that that's a bad thing, at all.
